alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 1:42PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 5500 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST TUESDAY ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 5500 feet, heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 13 inches, with 2 to 3 feet above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Alpine, Pine-Strawberry, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 5 PM Today to 11 PM Tuesday: Alpine 7 to 11 inches Pine-Strawberry 5 to 9 inches Pinetop-Lkside 9 to 13 inches Show Low 4 to 8 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
